The Northern Sentinel wants to know what you would like to ask Santa Claus this holiday season

The Kitimat Northern Sentinel has gained an interview with the one and only Santa Claus, and wants to know what questions you’d like Santa to answer this holiday season?

With Santa unable to come out to meet families in person this holiday season, he’s agreed to speak with the Northern Sentinel to answer some questions about how Christmas is going to work this year.

Do you, your kids, your grandkids, your nieces and nephews, or anyone else you know have a question you’d love to ask Santa? If so, send questions along with the name of the person asking to newsroom@northernsentinel.com, or call 250-632-6144 and Northern Sentinel editor, Clare, will be happy to pass along your questions when she speaks to Santa.

Send in questions by Dec. 7 for them to reach the Northern Sentinel in time for the interview.



clare.rayment@northernsentinel.com

title: Santa Claus is coming to Kitimat! – Kitimat Northern Sentinel
